_header: Lords if ye will listen to me / Of Crotey the noble city
_description: A miracle of the Virgin Mary: the Saving of Crotey city — forty-three couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOrdus ȝif ȝe wol lusten to meOf Croteye þe noble
                    Cite…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou ladi preye þi sone on hihTo alle cristene he graunte
                    Merci. Amen.
